useEffect(()=>{const allServices=serviceCategories.flatMap(category=>category.services);setServices(allServices);setFilteredServices(allServices);},[]);// Handle URL parameters
useEffect(()=>{const category=searchParams.get('category');if(category){setSelectedCategory(category);}},[searchParams]);// Filter and sort services
useEffect(()=>{let filtered=services;// Filter by category
if(selectedCategory!=='all'){filtered=filtered.filter(service=>service.category.id===selectedCategory);}// Filter by search term
